question: Ash, where are we?
answer: I'll tell ya in a second. Now we're still on seventy-five just past the county border... ...Which would put us...which would put us...

question: Jesus Christ, just tell us already will ya?
answer: ...Right... ...Right...

question: Yes?
answer: Here!

question: These mountains seem familiar.
answer: What do they remind you of? Some- thing majestic? Adventure?

question: Yeah, more like adventure.
answer: Any adventure in particular?

question: It's supposed to be one of these on here. Hey, this place has a dungeon. Put these back will you? They nailed it shut.
answer: Good, I don't like cellars. Probably just some garbage down there anyways.

question: Cheryl, they don't nail garbage in cellars. I mean it's not going to try and get out or anything.
answer: Well, what's down there?

question: Well, this one of the clock's not bad.
answer: I got it right here.

question: Cheryl, this is really good. I like how you did the numbers in that wood- ish style.
answer: I knew you'd like it.

question: Then get that lantern. Scott? Ahhhhhhh! What the hell are you doing down here, jerkin' off? How come you didn't answer me?
answer: When?

question: Just now, I mean upstairs.
answer: I didn't hear you.

question: Oh well, did you find anything?
answer: Uh-uh.

question: Tantir-ah-mis-trobeen-ha-zar-ta Tantir-man-ov-mis-hazen-sober. Kanda!
answer: Shut it off.

question: Kanda!
answer: Shut it off.

question: Kanda!
answer: Shut it offffff!

question: He's really been bothering you hasn't he?
answer: No. It's not Scott. Scotty's okay. It's just that ever since we came up here, things have been a little too tense. All these crazy things going on. And look at that window- we're gonna have to pay for that window now.

question: It'll be better tomorrow. Things'll smooth out, you'll see.
answer: I hope so. What'ya say we stay up for a while and listen to the storm.

question: Deal. Lemme check on Cheryl. I'll be right back. Ah ha!
answer: Stealing from the blind eh? It's for you.

question: It better be good. Oh Ash, it's beautiful.
answer: I was going to give it to you before we left, but things got so hectic, this is the first chance I've had. Do you like it?

question: Cheryl, there's nothing out there. Trees do not attack people.
answer: Ashly, will you drive me into town or not?

question: Right Now? Sure, sure I'll drive you into town. But if you'll just listen to what you're saying, you-
answer: I don't care how it sounds. I want to leave this minute. You can bring back my things when you go.

question: Okay- if you don't want to stay, I can't make you.
answer: I'll stay some place in town tonight. It's not gonna start. I know it's not gonna start. It's not gonna let us leave. Why are you slowing down? What is this? No, no, no, no, no...it's not going to let us leave, it's not going to let us go...it's not gonna let us gooooo!

question: I'll stay some place in town tonight. It's not gonna start. I know it's not gonna start. It's not gonna let us leave. Why are you slowing down? What is this? No, no, no, no, no...it's not going to let us leave, it's not going to let us go...it's not gonna let us gooooo!
answer: Cheryl, wanna play some cards?

question: Uh-uh.
answer: Hey, tomorrow morning, we'll find some way around that cliff into town okay?

question: Okay, guess this card.
answer: How am I going to know what card that is?

question: Guess, I'm going to see if you're psychic.
answer: Okaaaay...is it a queen?

question: Right!
answer: Really?

question: Yeah.
answer: Hey Ash, I guessed the card right.

question: Cheryl, did you see that? Try this one.
answer: Okay, lemme think, uh... ...Um, it's a seven.

question: Oh my God, what suit?
answer: Diamonds, no wait! I mean hearts!

question: That's right- seven of hearts!
answer: Hey Ash, did you see that? I guessed two cards in a row.

question: And what about her eyes? What about her eyes? For God's sake what happened to her eyes?!
answer: Everything's gonna be all right.

question: Scotty, I...I think there's some- thing out there.
answer: ...Is to get some rest. Ash and I can stay up with Cheryl.

question: Okay.
answer: Everything's gonna be okay. Come morning- you'll see. Shelly, are you okay? Keep an eye on Cheryl for a minute. Shelly? Shelly?

question: Thank you. I don't know what I would have done if I had remained on the hot coals burning my pretty flesh. You have pretty skin- give it to us!
answer: Ahhhhhhh!

question: Ahhhhhhh!
answer: No...no...no...

question: Hit her! Hit it!
answer: Uh...Scott.

question: Yeah.
answer: What is uh...what are we gonna do?

question: Bury her.
answer: You...can't bury Shelly. She's a friend of ours isn't she?

question: Ash, she's dead. Shelly's dead. We're gonna bury her now. I saw an old hiking trail when we were driving up here. Now I don't know if it goes all the way around that gorge-
answer: -Or if it's even still in tact.

question: Or if it's even still in tact. But uh, I guess I'll find out. Take good care of Linda.
answer: I will. Do you have everything?

question: Yeah- all set.
answer: Listen...Scotty...I'm sorry about falling apart like that when-

question: Don't bother, really. If I find a way out of here, I'll mark it and then come back. Then if I'm not back here in a few hours... if for some reason...well, if I don't come back, grab Linda, leg and all, and just get her the hell out of here.
answer: You're a good man.

question: Who's there? Ash?
answer: It's me Linda.

question: Ash, I had a bad dream about Linda.
answer: You did baby?

question: Yeah. She's all right isn't she?
answer: Yeah. Fine.

question: Is Shelly okay too Ash?
answer: Yeah, sure. She's sleeping that's all.

question: Ash, I love you.
answer: Get some rest.

question: Ash, I think I'm dying. Jesus, I can't feel my legs.
answer: Uh...uh Scotty you're gonna be okay. You're gonna be just fine- you'll see. You'll see.

question: It's, it's not gonna let us leave... Cheryl...Cheryl was right...we're all gonna die here...
answer: We're not gonna die!

question: ...All gonna die. All of us.
answer: We're not gonna die! We're not gonna die! We're getting out of here! Now listen to me- is there a way around the chasm. Scotty. Scott!

question: Scott, is there some way around the chasm?
answer: Ash, I'm scared- I...I can't feel my legs.

question: Scott, listen to me please, for God's sake. Is there a way around the chasm?
answer: There is...one way, the trail...but the trees, they know...don't you see- they're alive!! They're ali-ahhhhhhh!

question: I won't, I won't- I promise.
answer: Ashly? Ashly, help me. Let me out of here. I'm all right now. I'm all right now, Ashly. I'm all right. Come unlock this chain and let me out.

question: Cheryl? Cheryl?
answer: Ash, what are you doing? This is your sister Cheryl. Don't you recognize me?
